name: d6 Improvised Weapons for Death in Space
name_original: d6 Improvised Weapons for Death in Space
description:
d6 Improvised Weapons for Death in Space is a melee weapon collection for space hobos and DIY demigods.

Printer friendly version is on the way...

d6 Improvised Weapons for Death in Space is an independent production by Lazarus and is not affiliated with Stockholm Kartell. It is published under the DEATH IN SPACE Third Party License.
